User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"产品需求分析"，添加页眉显示"产品部"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "产品需求分析", level=1);add_header(doc_path, "产品部");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"用户需求"、"功能需求"和"非功能需求"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "用户需求", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "功能需求", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "非功能需求", level=2);

User instruction: 在"功能需求"下插入一个5行4列的表格。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 5, 4);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "需求ID");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "需求描述");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "优先级");set_cell_text(table, 0, 3, "状态");

User instruction: 在"非功能需求"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "性能需求", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "安全需求", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "可用性需求", style="List Number");
